MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Denison Mines Project in Asia, Mongolia dated February 2007

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Denison Mines Project in Asia, Mongolia dated February 2007
document.description: An independent technical report on Denison Mines Corp.'s uranium properties in Mongolia, conforming to National Instrument 43-101, reporting a mineral resource estimate on the Hairhan property.
